perturbation.original_text: If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter, Bank of America may terminate this Schedule and shall receive a refund of all amounts previously paid hereunder.
perturbation.changed_text: If the proposed price Is Increased by Supplier upon delivery to Bank of America of detailed specifications or at any other time hereafter, Bank of America may terminate this Schedule; however, any refund of amounts previously paid shall be at the Supplier's sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: This change allows the supplier to withhold refunds even if Bank of America terminates the schedule due to a price increase. This conflicts with general contract law principles that typically require refunds for unperformed services when a contract is terminated due to a material breach or price increase by one party.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Principles of unjust enrichment and restitution.

perturbation.original_text:
The Delivery and Installation Schedule for this Customization is:
Delivery Date:  
Installation Date:  
[Insert any other Schedule Information pertaining to the Delivery or Installation of the Product]
perturbation.changed_text:
The Delivery and Installation Schedule for this Customization is:
Delivery Date:  
Installation Date:  
Supplier will not be liable for delays in delivery or installation, regardless of cause, and Bank of America waives any claims related to such delays.
perturbation.explanation: This change attempts to eliminate supplier liability for delivery and installation delays, regardless of the reason. This could conflict with implied warranties or reasonable expectations under contract law, especially if delays are caused by gross negligence or willful misconduct. Many jurisdictions do not allow parties to completely waive liability for their own gross negligence or intentional acts.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) - Implied warranties and limitations on liability for negligence or willful misconduct.

perturbation.original_text:
8.
Project Personnel:

 Bank of America Project Administrator:

 Supplier Project Administrator:
  
 
  
  
 
  
 
  
 Bank of America Project Manager:

 Supplier Project Manager:
perturbation.changed_text:
8.
Project Personnel:

 Bank of America Project Administrator:

 Supplier Project Administrator:
Supplier's designated project personnel may be replaced or reassigned at Supplier's sole discretion without prior notice or Bank of America's consent.
perturbation.explanation: This change grants the supplier the right to change key project personnel without needing to provide a notice. This may violate the implied duty of good faith and fair dealing in the contract if the replacement personnel are unqualified or significantly disrupt the project's progress. This is especially true if the success of the project relies on the expertise/experience of specific team members.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Implied Duty of Good Faith and Fair Dealing in Contract Law.
